languages.text: {n}Вздрогнув, сервитор поднимает голову и упирает в вас взгляд аугментированных глаз. Черные блюдца визоров мутны и покрыты царапинами. Из динамика на горле служителя вырывается болезненный стон.{/n} "Ет... Ет... Единица докладывает... о функционировании. Единица идент... идент... идентифицируется... как? Информация отсутствует. Сбой... Сбой... Неисправность. Омниссия знает... что?"

{n}The servitor gives a jolt, raises his head, and fixes his augmented eyes on you. The large black circles of his visors are cloudy and covered in scratches. A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"
languages.original_text: {n}Вздрогнув, сервитор поднимает голову и упирает в вас взгляд аугментированных глаз. Черные блюдца визоров мутны и покрыты царапинами. Из динамика на горле служителя вырывается болезненный стон.{/n} "Ет... Ет... Единица докладывает... о функционировании. Единица идент... идент... идентифицируется... как? Информация отсутствует. Сбой... Сбой... Неисправность. Омниссия знает... что?"

traits.locale_text: {n}The servitor winces, raises his head, and fixes his augmented eyes upon you. The large black circles of his visors are cloudy and scratched all over. A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"

The Omnissiah knows... what?"

A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターがビクッと体を震わせ、頭を上げてオーギュメントの瞳であなたを見つめる。バイザー上の大きな黒い円は曇っており、引っかき傷だらけだ。痛々しいうめき声か従者の喉についたスピーカーから聞こえてくる。{/n}「ユーーユ…ユニット・ステータス…作動中。ユニットにーーにんしょーー認証…不明？データ利用不可。エラー…エラー…異常発生。万機神のみぞ知る…何？」
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor gives a jolt, raises his head, and fixes his augmented eyes on you. The large black circles of his visors are cloudy and covered in scratches. A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターがビクッと体を震わせ、頭を上げてオーギュメントの瞳であなたを見つめる。バイザー上の大きな黒い円は曇っており、引っかき傷だらけだ。痛々しいうめき声か従者の喉についたスピーカーから聞こえてくる。{/n}「ユーーユ…ユニット・ステータス…作動中。ユニットにーーにんしょーー認証…不明？データ利用不可。エラー…エラー…異常発生。万機神のみぞ知る…何？」

languages.text: {n}机仆颤抖了一下，抬起头来，用他那双改造过的眼睛盯着你。他面甲上的巨大黑圈浑浊不清，布满了划痕，喉咙处的音阵装置发出一声痛苦的呻吟。{/n}“单——单——单位状态……可运转。单位识——识——识别自己为……？无数据。错误……错误……故障。欧姆尼塞亚无所不……什么？”
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor gives a jolt, raises his head, and fixes his augmented eyes on you. The large black circles of his visors are cloudy and covered in scratches. A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工颤抖了一下，抬起头来，用他那双改造过的眼睛盯着你。他面甲上的巨大黑圈浑浊不清，布满了划痕，喉咙处的音阵装置发出一声痛苦的呻吟。{/n}“单——单——单位状态……可运转。单位识——识——识别自己为……？无数据。错误……错误……故障。欧姆尼塞亚无所不……什么？”

languages.text: {n}Le servitor tressaille, redresse la tête et pose son regard augmenté sur vous. Alors qu'il vous observe, vous remarquez que ses viseurs sont troubles et rayés. Sa gorge émet un gémissement torturé.{/n} « É-é-état de l'unité... Opérationnelle. Identité de l'uni-uni-unité... Aucune donnée disponible. Erreur... Erreur... Défaillance. L'Omnimessie sait... quoi ? »
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor gives a jolt, raises his head, and fixes his augmented eyes on you. The large black circles of his visors are cloudy and covered in scratches. A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le servitor tressaille, redresse la tête et pose son regard augmenté sur vous. Alors qu'il vous observe, vous remarquez que ses viseurs sont troubles et rayés. Sa gorge émet un gémissement torturé.{/n} « Sta-sta-statut de l'unité... Opérationnelle. Identité de l'uni-uni-unité... Aucune donnée disponible. Erreur... Erreur... Défaillance. L'Omnimessie sait... quoi ? »

languages.text: {n}El servidor se sacude, levanta la cabeza y fija sus ojos aumentados en ti. Los enormes círculos negros de sus visores están empañados y cubiertos de arañazos. El altavoz de la garganta del sirviente produce un gemido de dolor.{/n} «Es... es... estado de unidad... operacional. La un... un... unidad se identifica como... Datos no disponibles. Error... Error... Error. El Omnissiah sabe... ¿qué?».
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor gives a jolt, raises his head, and fixes his augmented eyes on you. The large black circles of his visors are cloudy and covered in scratches. A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"

traits.locale_text: {n}El servidor se retuerce, levanta la cabeza y fija sus ojos aumentados en ti. Los enormes círculos negros de sus visores están empañados y cubiertos de arañazos. El altavoz de la garganta del sirviente produce un gemido de dolor.{/n} «Es... es... estado de unidad... operacional. La un... un... unidad se identifica como... Datos no disponibles. Error... Error... Error. El Omnissiah sabe... ¿qué?».

languages.text: {n}Der Servitor zuckt zusammen, hebt den Kopf und fixiert dich mit seinen augmentierten Augen. Die großen schwarzen Kreise seiner Visoren sind trübe und mit Kratzern bedeckt. Ein Schmerzensstöhnen ertönt aus dem Lautsprecher an der Kehle des Dieners.{/n} "Ein-Ein-Einheit ... betriebsbereit. Einheit ident- ident- identifiziert sich ... als? Keine Daten verfügbar. Fehler ... Fehler ... Fehlfunktion. Der Omnissiah weiß ... was?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor gives a jolt, raises his head, and fixes his augmented eyes on you. The large black circles of his visors are cloudy and covered in scratches. A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Servitor verzieht das Gesicht, hebt den Kopf und fixiert dich mit seinen augmentierten Augen. Die großen schwarzen Kreise seiner Visoren sind trübe und mit Kratzern bedeckt. Ein Schmerzensstöhnen ertönt aus dem Lautsprecher an der Kehle des Dieners.{/n} "Ein-Ein-Einheit ... betriebsbereit. Einheit ident- ident- identifiziert sich ... als? Keine Daten verfügbar. Fehler ... Fehler ... Fehlfunktion. Der Omnissiah weiß ... was?"

languages.text: {n}Hizmetör sarsılıyor, başını kaldırıp ogmentli gözlerini sana dikiyor. Büyük, siyah vizör daireleri, bulanık ve çizik içinde. Hizmetkârın boğazındaki hoparlörden acılı bir inleme yükseliyor.{/n} "Bir... Bir... Birim durumu... Faal. Birimin kendini tan... Tan... Tanımlama şekli? Veri mevcut değil. Hata. Hata. Arıza. Hermesih... Neyi biliyordu?"
languages.original_text: {n}The servitor gives a jolt, raises his head, and fixes his augmented eyes on you. The large black circles of his visors are cloudy and covered in scratches. A pained moan comes from the speaker on the servant's throat.{/n} "Un— un— unit status... operational. Unit ident— ident— identifies itself... as? No data available. Error... Error... Malfunction. The Omnissiah knows... what?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetör sarsılıyor, başını kaldırıyor ve ogmentli gözlerini sana dikiyor. Vizörlerinin büyük, siyah daireleri bulanık ve çizik içinde. Hizmetkârın boğazındaki hoparlörden acılı bir inleme yükseliyor.{/n} "Bir... Bir... Birim durumu... Faal. Birimin kendini tan... Tan... Tanımlama şekli? Veri mevcut değil. Hata. Hata. Arıza. Hermesih... Neyi biliyordu?"
